data.Name: Beyond Unbroken
data.Bio: Beyond Unbroken is an American rock band formed by former Escape the Fate members Monte and Michael Money in 2013. The band released its debut EP "Don't Wake the Dead - EP" on September 1, 2017 with production by Matt Good. The band's debut album "Running Out of Time" which was released on April 3, 2020. Read more on Last.fm
